com.gsma.services.rcs.ipcall

Class IPCallRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • IIPCallRenderer.Stub
      • com.gsma.services.rcs.ipcall.IPCallRenderer

  • public abstract class IPCallRenderer
extends IIPCallRenderer.Stub
    IP call renderer offers an interface to manage the IP call renderer instance independently of the joyn service. The IP call renderer is implemented in the application side. The IP call renderer receives the audio/video streaming over the network in RTP, decodes the audio samples and video frames, plays decoded audio samples and displays the decoded picture on the device screen.
    Author:
    Jean-Marc AUFFRET
